Welcome to EventMe

  • Learn More

Plan Your Event Today!

Here's how we can create your event today with ease and care.

Choose a Location and Date you would like to book and we will reserve it for you!

We provide hands on service so you feel comfortable with your event.

We offer a multitude of different assets you can add to your event like balloons, cakes, music, catering, etc

Services

Here are a list of Services EventMe has to offer!

Asset Sourcing

We source your assets for you so you don't have to go look for them and buy them yourself. No need to track down that balloon you've been looking for!

Location/Date Reservation

Once you complete the Create New Event Page, our EventMe staff will book your location, date and time you have specified. Now all there is left to do is wait!

Event Hosting

We operate as the proxy between you, the event planner, venue, and any other staff that will be in charge of helping bring your event to life!

Scheduling

We coordinate your event with your Guests and insure that there won't be any conflict in time with yourself, guests/staff, or venue.
